package xiangmu;
public class Ceshi {
    public static void main(String args[]) {
        // 嵌套循环输出星号三角形
        for(int m = 1; m <= 5; m++) {
            for(int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {
                System.out.print("*");
            }
            System.out.println();
        }
    }
}
